trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Espone e aggiorna le informazioni di appartenenza utente archiviate in un archivio dati di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser viene utilizzato per rappresentare un unico utente di appartenenza nell'archivio dati di appartenenze di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Espone le informazioni relative all'utente di appartenenza, ad esempio l'indirizzo di posta elettronica e fornisce funzionalità per l'utente di appartenenza, ad esempio la possibilità di modificare o reimpostare la propria password.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser viene restituito dal provider di appartenenze dell'applicazione ogni volta che l'applicazione è configurata per utilizzare un archivio dati di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: In un'applicazione che può essere configurata per l'utilizzo di dati diversi archivi o in un'applicazione che utilizza più archivi dati, è possibile fare riferimento alla classe di base, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: Perché non implementa l'oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>proprietà, è necessario essere pronti a gestire il <xref:System.NotSupportedException>che viene generata quando si accede a questi membri su un oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La classe ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser implementa le ottimizzazioni interne utilizzate per la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>classe per ridurre al minimo il numero di aggiornamenti degli attributi che si verificano quando si chiama il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Serializza inoltre il <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>rappresentazione (disponibile nel <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>proprietà) in modo che un oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser può essere serializzato e deserializzato senza generare eccezioni.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene restituito un oggetto di ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser dal <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metodi o come parte di un <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>restituito dal <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: È necessario un oggetto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metodo quando si desidera aggiornare le informazioni per un utente di appartenenza esistente.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser vengono mappate agli attributi di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencate le proprietà ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser e i relativi mapping degli attributi predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Attributo di directory predefinito | È possibile eseguire il mapping? | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| Sì, ma deve essere userPrincipalName o sAMAccountName | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| Sì, ma deve essere un attributo a valore singolo di tipo stringa Unicode. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| Non supportato da <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| Non supportato da <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none, ma deve essere mappato a un attributo, se utilizza la sicurezza di domande e risposte per la reimpostazione della password o il recupero. | Sì, ma deve essere un attributo a valore singolo di tipo stringa Unicode. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) | Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| calcolata in base a `lockoutTime` e la durata del blocco di Active Directory (AD in Windows 2000)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(AD in Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) | Non | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| Se è bloccato a causa di troppi tentativi di password errate, viene restituito l'attributo di tempo di blocco.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloccato a causa di un numero eccessivo di risposte segrete errate tentativi, il valore archiviato nell'attributo definito da `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se è bloccato a causa di una password errata sia un numero eccessivo di password errate tentativi, viene restituito il valore di data/ora più recente.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: Se l'account non è bloccato, viene restituito 1/1/1753 per la compatibilità SQL. | Non |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> oggetto per una classe che eredita il <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser non deve essere utilizzato dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> classe con i valori di proprietà specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Creazione di un nuovo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>oggetto non aggiunge un nuovo oggetto utente di appartenenza nell'archivio dati di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un nuovo utente di appartenenza all'archivio dati, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metodo restituisce un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>oggetto per l'utente di appartenenza aggiunto all'archivio dati.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>gli oggetti vengono in genere creati nel codice dell'applicazione per l'utilizzo con il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>(metodo), anche se è anche possibile passare un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metodo nonché.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>gli oggetti sono in genere anche creati dalle implementazioni del provider di appartenenza per il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>indirizzo dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>valore per l'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>valore per l'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro non viene usato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro non viene usato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>dell'utente di appartenenza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta informazioni specifiche dell'applicazione per l'utente di appartenenza.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di commento può essere utilizzata per archiviare informazioni personalizzate per un utente di appartenenza che è specifico per un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: La quantità di informazioni che possono essere archiviate nel `Comment` proprietà per un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>è definito in <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di commento viene eseguito il mapping per il `Comment` attributo Active Directory predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non può essere rimappata a un altro attributo.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni specifiche dell'applicazione per il membro di Active Directory archiviato nel <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> attributo directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'indirizzo di posta elettronica dell'utente di appartenenza.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del messaggio di posta elettronica viene eseguito il mapping per il `Mail` attributo directory.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere rimappata nel file Web. config mediante l'impostazione di `attributeMapUserName` attributo la [elemento providers per profile (Schema delle impostazioni ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) per i profili.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: L'indirizzo di posta elettronica dell'utente di appartenenza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'utente di appartenenza può essere autenticato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>valore di un utente di appartenenza viene verificato durante la chiamata a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>da <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà IsApproved restituisce `false`, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>restituisce `false` anche se il nome utente e la password siano corretti.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà IsApproved viene mappata a uno dei seguenti attributi di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Active Directory | `User-Account-Control`| | Active Directory Application Mode | `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| Questa proprietà non può essere rimappata a un altro attributo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'utente può essere autenticato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Genera un' <xref:System.NotSupportedException>eccezione in tutti i casi</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà LastActivityDate non è supportata dalla <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di ottenere o impostare il valore genererà sempre un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Genera sempre un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>eccezione.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.
trans-unit.target: qualsiasi tentativo di ottenere o impostare la proprietà LastActivityDate.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>eccezione in tutti i casi.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastLoginDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà LastLoginDate non è supportata dalla <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di ottenere o impostare il valore genererà sempre un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Genera sempre un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>eccezione.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastLoginDate property.
trans-unit.target: qualsiasi tentativo di ottenere o impostare la proprietà LastLoginDate.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'identificatore utente dall'archivio dati di Active Directory per l'utente di appartenenza.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ProviderUserKey espone l'identificatore di appartenenze origine di dati tipizzata in modo generico come un `object`.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProviderUserKey può eseguire il cast come un <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore utente dai dati di Active Directory dell'archivio per l'utente di appartenenza.
